outline:
1. to dedicate, consecrate, separate
    1. (Niphal) to dedicate oneself, devote oneself
    2. (Hiphil) to keep sacredly separate
  2. (Hiphil) to be a Nazarite, live as a Nazarite
strongs_def: to hold aloof, i.e. (intransitivey) abstain (from food and drink, from impurity, and even from divine worship (i.e. apostatize)); specifically, to set apart (to sacred purposes), i.e. devote
